commands.command: CREATE TABLE clients ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(25), surname varchar(25), address varchar(50), )
CREATE TABLE `supplier` ( `id` SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(25) , `surname` varchar(25) , `address` varchar(50), )
CREATE TABLE `products` ( `id` SERIAL PRIMARY KEY , `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `price` REAL NOT NULL, )
CREATE TABLE `purchase_order_header` ( `id` SERIAL PRIMARY KEY , `id_client` INT FOREIGN KEY id REFERENCES(client), `date` DATE )

CREATE TABLE `purchase_order_line`( `id` SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, `id_header` INT FOREIGN KEY id REFERENCES(purchase_order_header), `id_product` INT FOREIGN KEY id REFERENCES(products), `quantity` FLOAT(5,3) )
